invitations.subgroupInvitationDesc: You're being invited to join a specific subgroup within this educational group. Your parent account will be added as a shadow account to monitor your activity.
invitations.selectKidAccountDesc: Choose which kid account will join this educational group
invitations.pleaseSelectKid: Please select a kid account to join this educational group
invitations.creatingOneOffNotImplemented: Creating one-off kid accounts is not yet implemented. Please use an existing kid account.
invitations.oneOffKidsSubgroupOnly: One-off kid accounts are only available for subgroup invitations
invitations.subgroupInvitationExplanation: This is a subgroup invitation for an educational group. Please select which kid account should join this subgroup. Your parent account will automatically be added as a shadow account.
invitations.educationalGroupExplanation: This is an educational group. Please select which kid account should join.
invitations.createOneOffKidDesc: Don't have a kid account? You can create a temporary kid account specifically for this subgroup invitation.
invitations.createKidAccountFirst: You may need to create a kid account first.

invite.educationalGroupDesc: This is an educational group. The invitation will be sent to the location you're currently viewing.
invite.noUsersSelected: No users selected yet. Search and select users to invite.
invite.addPersonalMessage: Add a personal message to your invitation...
invite.failedToSendInvitations: Failed to send invitations. Please try again.
invite.failedToUpdateInvitation: Failed to update invitation. Please try again.
invite.allInvitationsResponded: All invitations have been responded to or expired.

groups.discoverCommunities: Discover communities and connect with like-minded people

theme.themeInfoDescription: The theme affects the overall appearance of the interface. You can choose between light, dark, or automatic based on your system preferences.
theme.lightThemeDescription: Clean and bright interface with light backgrounds
theme.purpleThemeDescription: Imperial purple theme with elegant dark purple backgrounds
theme.blackThemeDescription: Minimal black theme for maximum contrast and focus
